subject: Football
Computers and the Internet
Statistics
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Seven years after Chuck Bower and his partners began working on a program that analyzes close calls and player personnel decisions in football, they have yet to find a team willing to try it.
snippet: Seven years after Chuck Bower and his partners began working on a program that analyzes close calls and player personnel decisions in football, they have yet to find a team willing to try it.
